pdfscraper.layout.utils.group_objs_y(words, gap=5, decimals=1)[source]¶

Group words into vertically adjacent lines.

First, create a dictionary with rounded y-coordinates as keys, and lists of words as values. Then merge together lists whose coordinate delta is <= gap.

@param words: list of Words @param gap: vertical delta between lines to be merged. @param decimals: rounding precision.

@returns: vertically grouped lines, each line is sorted horizontally inside.

Parameters

  • words (List) –

  • gap (float) –

  • decimals (int) –

Return type

List[List]
